title: CH445 - Wing Chair Stool Wool/Light Green
body: Produced in exact accordance with Hans J. Wegnerâ€™s design. Mobelaris high quality style of the Wing Chair Stool is an obvious match to his two iconic lounge chairs, Wing Chair and Oculus Chair, all three designed in 1940. An incredibly styled furniture that did not sacrifice comfort, making you feel light as a feather when you sit. Whether it is movie marathon night or just a lazy night with a good book, you will definitely feel relaxed with this combination.
